properties.description: The type of title.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: The authority file from which the name was taken.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Person or corporate entity responsible for creating or contributing to the original resource. Check LCNAF (http://id.loc.gov/authorities/names.html) for form of name and use if present
properties.title: Name

properties.description: Designates the relationship (role) of the entity recorded in name to the resource described in the record. Select term from MARC Relator Term list (http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html). The first letter of the first Role term should be capitalized.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Use default MODS Type of Resource values, http://www.loc.gov/standards/mods/userguide/typeofresource.html
properties.title: Type of Resource

properties.description: Prefer use of controlled vocabulary, recommend AAT (http://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/aat/).
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Used to describe the form of the object. AAT terms should be entered in lowercase
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: A place associated with the issuing, publication, release, distribution, manufacture, production, or origin of the resource.
properties.title: Place of Publication

properties.description: The name of the entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the original resource.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: Date the resource was created. Use for born-digital and unpublished or informally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source resource, not the digital version
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: Date that the resource was published, released, or issued. Use for formally published material
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Use ISO 639-2, three-letter codes.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: A description of the language in which the content of the resource is expressed. Strongly recommended for textual material.
properties.title: Language (code)

properties.description: The physical form or medium of the material for the source resource. Used for material, texture or color
properties.title: Form

properties.description: A statement of the number and specific material of the units of the source resource. Generally size or duration information
properties.title: Extent

properties.description: The method by which a resource achieved digital form
properties.title: Digital Origin

properties.description: An identification of the electronic format type, or the data representation of the resource.
properties.title: Internet Media Type

properties.description: General textual information about the physical condition of the source resource
properties.title: Condition of Original

properties.description: A summary of the content of the original resource. Includes abstract, free-text account of resource, etc.
properties.title: Description

properties.description: User "ownership" for the institution or repository that holds the original resource and/or where it is available.
properties.title: Type of Note

properties.description: General textual information relating to a resource.
properties.title: Note

properties.description: Terms should come from a controlled vocabulary, recommend FAST (http://fast.oclc.org/)
properties.title: Subject Authority

properties.description: Topic represented by resource
Location represented in or by the resource
A statement of coordinates covered by the resource
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: Person or entity represented in or by the resource
properties.title: Name

properties.description: Chronological period represented in or by the resource
Information that identifies other resources related to the one being described.
properties.title: Related Resources

properties.description: A host or parent resource such as a collection to which the source resource belongs.
properties.title: Collection Title

properties.description: A description of the collection to which a source resource belongs
properties.title: Collection Description

properties.description: Name of related resource(s) in which the source resource appeared.
properties.title: Appears In

properties.description: Contains a unique standard number or code that distinctively identifies a resource.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: The institution or repository that holds the source resource or where it is available.
properties.title: Physical Location

properties.description: Information about restrictions imposed on access to a resource
properties.title: Rights
